abstract: The United Steelworkers withdrew its petition to a trade panel after an industry group agreed to work with the union to address concerns over Chinese production.
snippet: The United Steelworkers withdrew its petition to a trade panel after an industry group agreed to work with the union to address concerns over Chinese production.
lead_paragraph: HONG KONG — The United Steelworkers union has suspended indefinitely an unusual effort to push the United States government to restrict all aluminum imports after the campaign ran into opposition from aluminum companies, the Canadian government and even Canadian members of the union.

headline.main: Union Drops Effort to Restrict U.S. Imports of Raw Aluminum
